errors.cannotedit-annotation-locked: Cannot edit. The annotation is locked.
errors.openforViewingOnly: The document is open for viewing only. Editing disabled.

double-click-to-verify.title: Double click to verify this signature

states.success: Signature verified. The document has not been modified since this signature was applied.
states.failed: Signature verification failed. The document is modified since this signature was applied.

allow-auto-play-audio.message: The document wants to automatically start playing audio.Do you want to allow this?
allow-auto-play-audio.title: Confirm action

allow-auto-play-video.message: The document wants to automatically start playing a video. Do you want to allow this?
allow-auto-play-video.title: Confirm action

allow-enter-pip-mode.title: Confirm action
allow-enter-pip-mode.message: The document would like to display the video in Picture-in-Picture mode. Would you like to allow this?

validation.min-failed: The minimum value must be greater than or equal to {{min}}
validation.max-failed: The maximum value must be less than or equal to {{max}}
validation.minlength-failed: The minimum length of the input value must be greater than or equal to {{minlength}}
validation.maxlength-failed: The maximum length of the input value must be less than or equal to {{maxlength}}
validation.regex-pattern-failed: The value does not match the regular expression pattern: {{pattern}}

alert.validation-failed-confirm-apply: Form validation failed. Do you want to apply changes anyway?

cancel-btn.label: Cancel
cancel-btn.title: Cancel changes and close this dialog.

download-btn.label: Download
download-btn.title: Download the modified PDF, keep this dialog open.

done-btn.label: Done
done-btn.title: Apply changes and close this dialog. This action cannot be undone.

split-range-button.title: Split this range into single pages.

add-range-dropdown.add-ranges-confirm-format: Are you sure you want to create {{rangesCount}} ranges?

add-all-pages.label: Single pages
add-all-pages.title: Create a range for each page. Provides maximum flexibility to manipulate individual pages.

add-single-range.label: All pages
add-single-range.title: Create one range for all pages. Allows manipulating all pages together as a single unit.

add-odd-pages.label: Odd pages
add-odd-pages.title: Create a range that includes all odd pages.

add-even-pages.label: Even pages
add-even-pages.title: Create a range that includes all even pages.

add-pages-by-size.label: Page size
add-pages-by-size.title: Create a range for each page size/orientation.

add-empty-page.label: Empty page
add-empty-page.title: Create a range with a new empty page.

add-custom-range.title: Create custom ranges from page numbers based on your input.

add-range-dropdown.label: Add Page Ranges
add-range-dropdown.title: Add Page Ranges

done-btn.title: Apply Replace Text operations and close this dialog. This action cannot be undone.

select-text-hint.line2: or click the 'Back' button to return to the main dialog.

add-link-over-annotation.title: Add Link Annotation over this item

search.wildcards-title: Wildcard search. Supported wildcards are * (matches any number of characters) and ? (matches a single character zero or one time).
search.proximity-title: Proximity search. Use operator AROUND(n) to specify the maximum count of words between search terms, for example: apple AROUND(4) juice
